_Startup: Settings that will only be used at startup.

Startup._EnableSwagger: Enable or disable the Swagger UI.

ConnectionStrings._MongoConnection: The connection string to the MongoDB database.
ConnectionStrings._Loki: Destination of the loki log processor.

_Multiplexers: Define ports and for what protocols to listen on these ports.

Multiplexers._Name: A name used to identify the multiplexer during logging.
Multiplexers.Name: Netflow-9 Multiplexer
Multiplexers._ListeningPort: The port this multiplexer will listen on.
Multiplexers._Parsers: The parsers that will be used to parse incoming packets.

ProtocolMultiplexerConfig._Enabled: Enable or disable the protocol multiplexer.
ProtocolMultiplexerConfig._ListeningPort: The port to listen on for protocol multiplexer.
ProtocolMultiplexerConfig._EnabledParsers: The collectors that should be enabled by the protocol multiplexer. Possible values are: Netflow9, Ipfix

Security._Enabled: Enable or disable the requirement for authentication to access protected endpoints.
Security._Access: Configuration for users and how accessing endpoints should behave.

Access._Username: The username of the default user. Only generated if no users exist in the database.
Access._Password: The password of the default user.

DnsCacheCleanupServiceOptions._DnsCacheCleanupInterval: Interval at which the DnsCacheCleanupService should check for expired DNS records. Format is dd:hh:mm:ss.

DnsCheckServiceOptions._DnsCheckInterval: Interval at which the DnsCheckService should check for changes in DNS records. Format is dd:hh:mm:ss.

DnsResolverServiceOptions._StaleEntryDuration: Duration after which a DNS record is considered stale. Format is dd:hh:mm:ss.
